 âˆ™ Finances: The woman and her family should be assisted in calculating an estimate of expenses of the 
delivery and related aspects (such as transport). They should also be advised to keep an emergency fund or 
have a source for emergency funding in case of complications. Keep in mind the various schemes that are 
available for assisting women with transportation facilities or providing funds for maternal health (such as the
